Help: Welcome to the Media Downloader Bot! Commands: - /help: Display this help message. How to use: To download media from TikTok simply send a TikTok video or photo slides link directly to the bot. The bot will process the link and send the media file back to you. Additional Notes: Ensure the TikTok link is directly accessible (not private or restricted). Supported formats: Video and photo slides.
ErrorMessage: Error message: Something is wrong either with the link or with the server. Please report this incident to the bot administrator.
